name: devutils
title: DevUtils
description: Navigate DevUtils faster with this All-in-one Toolbox for Developers
author: vietanhlehuu

commands.name: auto
commands.title: Auto Detect the Best Tool
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Let the auto-detect feature decide which tool to activate based on your current clipboard string

commands.name: backslash
commands.title: Backslash Escape/Unescape
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Escape (or unescape) backslashes in your current clipboard string

commands.name: base64encode
commands.title: Base64 String Encode/Decode
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Decode the Base64 string in clipboard (if it’s decodable)

commands.name: base64image
commands.title: Base64 Image Encode/Decode
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Decode the Base64 string in clipboard to an image (if it’s decodable)

commands.name: colortools
commands.title: Color Converter
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Pick and convert colors (hex, rgb, hsv, hsv, cymk, etc.)

commands.name: cronparser
commands.title: Cron Job Parser
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Parse the cron job expression in clipboard (if it’s a valid cron expression)

commands.name: cssformatter
commands.title: CSS Beautify/Minify
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Beautify or minify your current clipboard as CSS

commands.name: csv2json
commands.title: CSV to JSON
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert your current clipboard from CSV to JSON

commands.name: erbformatter
commands.title: ERB Beautify/Minify
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Beautify or minify your current clipboard as ERB

commands.name: hashing
commands.title: Hash Generator
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Calculate the hash of your current clipboard string

commands.name: html2jsx
commands.title: HTML to JSX
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert the HTML string in clipboard to JSX

commands.name: htmlencode
commands.title: HTML Entity Encode/Decode
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Escape (or unescape) the HTML entities your current clipboard string

commands.name: htmlformatter
commands.title: HTML Beautify/Minify
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Beautify or minify your current clipboard as HTML

commands.name: htmlpreview
commands.title: HTML Preview
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Show a HTML preview of your current clipboard string

commands.name: jsformatter
commands.title: JS Beautify/Minify
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Beautify or minify your current clipboard as JavaScript

commands.name: json2csv
commands.title: JSON to CSV
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert your current clipboard from JSON to CSV

commands.name: json2php
commands.title: JSON to PHP
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert a JSON string in your clipboard to PHP object/array

commands.name: json2yaml
commands.title: JSON to YAML
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert your current clipboard from JSON to YAML

commands.name: jsonformatter
commands.title: JSON Format/Validate
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Format the JSON string currently in your clipboard (if it’s a valid JSON)

commands.name: jwt
commands.title: JWT Debugger
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Decode and verify the current JWT token in your clipboard

commands.name: lessformatter
commands.title: LESS Beautify/Minify
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Beautify or minify your current clipboard as LESS

commands.name: loremipsum
commands.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Get some randomly generated lorem ipsum strings

commands.name: markdownpreview
commands.title: Markdown Preview
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Preview the markdown string currently in your clipboard

commands.name: numberbase
commands.title: Number Base Converter
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert numbers between bases (oct, hex, binary, etc.)

commands.name: php2json
commands.title: PHP to JSON
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert a PHP object/array in your clipboard to JSON

commands.name: phpserializer
commands.title: PHP Serializer
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Serialize the PHP object/array in your clipboard

commands.name: phpunserializer
commands.title: PHP Unserializer
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Unserialize the string in your clipboard to a PHP object/array

commands.name: qrcode
commands.title: QR Code Reader/Generator
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Generate a QR code from your current clipboard string

commands.name: querystringparser
commands.title: URL Parser
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Parse the URL string currently in your clipboard

commands.name: randomstringgenerator
commands.title: Random String Generator
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Generate password or random string with symbols, digits, words, etc.

commands.name: regextester
commands.title: RegExp Tester
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Test your regular expression with a string and inspect matches, groups, etc.

commands.name: scssformatter
commands.title: SCSS Beautify/Minify
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Beautify or minify your current clipboard as SCSS

commands.name: sqlformatter
commands.title: SQL Formatter
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Format the SQL string currently in your clipboard

commands.name: stringcaseconverter
commands.title: String Case Converter
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert a string in clipboard into various naming conventions

commands.name: stringinspect
commands.title: String Inspector
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Inspect your current clipboard string (length, words count, unicode, etc.)

commands.name: textdiff
commands.title: Text Diff Checker
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Compare two texts and find diff (per characters, words, lines, etc.)

commands.name: unixtime
commands.title: Unix Time Converter
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Parse and display UNIX the timestamp string currently in your clipboard

commands.name: urlencode
commands.title: URL Encode/Decode
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Decode the current URL string in your clipboard (if any)

commands.name: uuidtool
commands.title: UUID/ULID Generate/Decode
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Decode the UUID in your clipboard (if any), or generate UUIDs

commands.name: xmlformatter
commands.title: XML Beautify/Minify
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Beautify or minify your current clipboard as XML

commands.name: yaml2json
commands.title: YAML to JSON
commands.subtitle: DevUtils.com
commands.description: Convert your current clipboard from YAML to JSON
